name: PixelTown
description:
PixelTown? It's totally normal. Yep. Just another completely mundane rural Organ town.

Wait. Did I say organ? I mean OREGON. OREGON TOWN. Ha ha ha whoops silly me no no no the only things we harvest here are broccoli I swear now didn't you say you had to be going?

...

Arrange the pieces to your liking. Tell a spooky story or just make a place you like. You want chickens vs. squirrels? You can do that in Pixel Town.

When you've got something you're happy with, press "F" and take a screenshot and share your art with the world! Or at least me. I absolutely want to see all of your creations.
